name: Go & Arrow
description:
Go & Arrow is a puzzler where the goal is to hit all targets with your bullets, and where your movement is restricted 
depending on which ammo types you have in your inventory. 
Ammo types double up as available  directions of movement. 
Features a dynamic soundtrack: instruments are bound to ammo types, and only play if that ammo type is in your inventory.

Made for PC.
Made in Unity3D 2017.
Used the Game Jam menu template (https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/40465)

Music and sound effects made in FL Studio 12 and Audacity.

Made by Ildefonso Pica, Tycho Snelder & Wouter van den Berg for the GMTK 2017 Game Jam.
